Activity: Arrive at the office. Prepare a cup of tea and catch up on industry news.
Check emails and project management system for updates.
Meet with @audit-1 to review the audit plan and address any questions.
Review the data security and privacy protocols and ensure that all team members are following the procedures. Work with @devops-1.
Call with @larch-1 and @sdev-1 and discuss the platform security and provide a solution together.
Lunch Break - Eat lunch with colleagues in the canteen.
Revise the protocols regarding the platform security and privacy.
Arrange a meeting with the whole team to make sure they are familiar with the updated version of the protocols.
Reply emails to solve any questions of the team members.
Check the progress of building the software, and offer help if necessary.
